attributes.action: Ban mobile phones calls on aircraft
attributes.additional_details:
Unless travelling “First” or “Business” class” passengers are already faced with a close, restricted and often uncomfortable experience while on board.

Imagine how much worse it would be if you were then forced to listen to an inane, loud or personal call of a total stranger you are sat next to.

Just because the technology exists (and safety may not be compromised) should NOT be a reason to allow such practices to be introduced. If the use of mobile phones is allowed during a flight then an already uncomfortable experience will be just made worse.

Surely the world will not end if a phone call cannot be made (or received) while on board!

Please BAN mobile phone calls from boarding the aircraft to getting into the terminal on arrival.
